short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Market Intelligence provides in-depth Amazon analytics for Viral Launch subscribers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ultimate tool to simplify product research, evaluate product potential, calculate profits, and analyze market competition—all in one place.
- :mag_right:AI-Driven Insights & Billions of Data Points
Pinpoint profitable niches, track sales and revenue, analyze keyword data, and more—all in real time as you browse Amazon.
- :chart_with_upwards_trend:Smarter Sourcing Decisions
Leverage these insights to spot high-opportunity products, streamline your research, and confidently grow your Amazon business.
- :handshake:Easy Access & Full Support
Simply sign in or start a free trial for full access. Need help? Our customer support team is here to assist.
Note: Anyone can download the extension, but an active Viral Launch subscription is needed to unlock all data points.

:star: Key Benefits
- :stopwatch: Instant Market Insights
Get sales estimates, historical trends, and keyword search volume without leaving the Amazon page.
- :moneybag:Profit & ROI Calculations
Eliminate guesswork with built-in calculators for both FBA and FBM to find your true profit potential.
- :trophy:Competitive Analysis
Quickly view essential metrics—BSR, monthly sales, revenues, and more—to decide if a product is worth pursuing.
- :robot_face: Time-Saving Automation
No more juggling multiple tools; everything you need lives right in the extension.
- :jigsaw:Seamless Integration
Part of the Viral Launch suite, so your data syncs perfectly with the rest of your seller tools.

:hammer_and_wrench: How to Install & Use
Existing Users
1. Add to Chrome
Go to the Chrome Web Store and click “Add to Chrome.” When prompted, select “Add extension” to install.
2. Open & Login
From your Chrome toolbar, open the extension and log in with your Viral Launch account email and password.
3. Pin for Easy Access
Pin the extension to your toolbar so you can launch it whenever you browse Amazon.
New Users
1. Start Free Trial
Sign up for a 14-day free trial of the Viral Launch software suite.
2. Create an Account
Once the extension is installed, open it and enter your new account credentials for unrestricted access to Amazon seller data.
3. Download the Extension
Head to the Viral Launch – Market Intelligence page in the Chrome Web Store and click “Add to Chrome.”
4. Pin It
After installing, pin the extension to your browser toolbar so it’s always just a click away
